page.title: 17WALPOLE CHASE DEVELOPMENT.
page.content: Beginning in spring 1985 D.&H.Builders of Long Sutton began the first phase of building on land which connects Walpole St. Peter and Walpole St. Andrew.They plan to build 80 dwellings which will take eight years to complete.These dwellings are to be 2,3 and 4 bedroomed bungalows and houses. In July 1985 they were laying the sewage pipe,digging out the road and laying the first two bases.Linked to this development is the planned new COMMUNITY CENTRE which will become the heart of the new Walpole.There is some Â£40,000 already in the bank and fund raising events will continue over the next few years.
